content: p f a r t e t e e r n eve fishtail scarf by chloe elizabeth birch eve fishtail scarf abbreviations cm centimetres cont continue g-st garter stitch every row knit g grammes k knit mm millimetres patt pattern p purl psso pass slipped stitch over repeat repeat rs right side sl1 slip 1 stitch knitwise ssk s lip slip knit together as follows slip each of next 2 sts knitwise one by one onto right needle slide left-hand needle into the front loops of these stitches and knit them together st s stitch es decrease together ws wrong side yon yarn over needle yfwd yarn forward yrn yarn round needle * r epeat instructions that follow the single asterisk as directed exquisite 4ply skill level scarf using 3mm needles cast on 60 sts and knit 4 row change to 3 25mm needles and proceed as follows - row 1 rs k2 p2 * k7 p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 finished measurements row 2 and all ws row k4 * p7 k2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 width approximately row 3 k2 p2 * yon ssk k3 k2tog yfwd yrn p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 cm 21 row 5 k2 p2 * k1 yfwd ssk k1 k2tog yfwd k1 p2 repeat length from * to last 2 sts k2 cm 142 row 7 k2 p2 * k2 yfwd sl1 k2tog psso yfwd k2 p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 8 k4 * p7 k2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 yarn row 1 to 8 set lace pattern with g-st borders west yorkshire spinners exquisite 4ply cont in patt until work measures approximately 141cm bayswater 318 1 x 100g from cast on edge ending with 8th row of patt this should leave enough yarn to work 5 row and cast off materials change to 3mm needles and knit 5 row cast off on ws 1 pair 3mm us2/uk11 knitting needles 1 pair 3 25mm us3/uk10 knitting needles making up gauge sew in loose ends and block to given measurements cover with a damp cloth and leave to dry 28 sts and 36 row to 10cm measured over lace pattern on 3 25mm needles or size required to achieve stated gauge it is essential to work to the stated gauge to ensure success designer s notes an elegant lace scarf designed with an eight-row pattern repeat suitable for an adventurous beginner lace knitter perfect as an everyday accessory that can also be styled with an evening outfit for an extra touch of luxury and warmth disclaimer please note that all quantities in this pattern are based on average usage and therefore are approximate we cannot accept responsibility for the finished garment if any other yarn than the one specified is used although every effort has been made to ensure that instructions are correct west yorkshire spinners cannot accept any liabilities owing to photography
